participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about animals, enjoys expressing feelings through poetry.
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. i have three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a love for literature and a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby.

content.text: It's great to srart a day with a coffee. Do you like coffee?
I do not, I do like coffee
So how do you start your day?
I am great. I am going to be a vet
Oh i love pets! Sometimes I write poems about them. What do you do in your spare time?
I like to read. I like to read.
Do you read about star wars?
I do not. I read books about books
Isn't there any book about star wars?
I have a favorite book about it.
Oh great! Do you like sports too?
I do not really have a favorite team
